content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a remote control. Moving in a clockwise direction from the remote control, the elements on the path are a ruffed grouse, a hard disk drive, a fire screen sheet, an automated teller machine, a pedestal, a swing, a cello, a combination lock, a goblet, a wombat, a mosque, a dishcloth, an American lobster, a dromedary, a gyromitra, a balance beam, a safe, a goldfinch, and a Saharan horned viper. Starting from the mosque, you move around the ring by 16 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 18 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 5 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 16 steps in a clockwise direction.
